Html:
Hello,

TriggerEditDialog could not be resolved even namespace Microsoft.Win32.TaskScheduler is added. I am trying to display dialog in a user control. What could be the reason.

Please revert.

Thanks,
Pabitra
For all UI elements, including TriggerEditDialog, you must reference the Microsoft.Win32.TaskSchedulerEditor.dll assembly along with the Microsoft.Win32.TaskScheduler.dll assembly .
This is resolved after referencing to correct version assembly. Thank you.
